verses.verse: וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there וַיִּמָּלֵ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> thence and escaped אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְעָרַ֣ת <S%H4631><s%> to the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <S%H5725><s%> Adullam וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> and when his brethren וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> and all his father's וַיֵּרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> [it] they went down אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> gathered אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And every one מָצ֜וֹק <S%H4689><s%> [that was] in distress וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who ל֤וֹ נֹשֶׁא֙ <S%H5378><s%> that [was] in debt וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one מַר־ <S%H4751><s%> angry נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and he וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> became עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over לְשָׂ֑ר <S%H8269><s%> themselves unto him and he became a captain וַיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> became עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> were about כְּאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> over them and there were with him about four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִצְפֵּ֣ה <S%H4708><s%> thence to Mizpeh מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> and he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king מוֹאָ֗ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab יֵֽצֵא־ <S%H3318><s%> I pray thee come forth נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> Please אָבִ֤י <S%H1><s%> Let my father וְאִמִּי֙ <S%H517><s%> and my mother אִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H854><s%> for עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> I אֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> [and be] with you till I know מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> will do לִּ֖י אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> what God

וַיַּנְחֵ֕ם <S%H5148><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> them before מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> and they dwelt עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> with him all the while הֱיוֹת־ <S%H1961><s%> become דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> that David בַּמְּצוּדָֽה׃ <S%H4686><s%> was in the hold ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said גָּ֨ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad הַנָּבִ֜יא <S%H5030><s%> And the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> Abide בַּמְּצוּדָ֔ה <S%H4686><s%> not in the hold לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> depart וּבָֽאתָ־ <S%H935><s%> and get לְּךָ֖ אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee into the land יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> Then David וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came יַ֥עַר <S%H3293><s%> into the forest חָֽרֶת׃ <S%H2802><s%> of Hareth ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> When Saul כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for נוֹדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> was discovered דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> that David וַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> and the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְשָׁאוּל֩ <S%H7586><s%> that [were] with him (now Saul יוֹשֵׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> abode בַּגִּבְעָ֜ה <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under הָאֶ֤שֶׁל <S%H815><s%> under a tree בָּֽרָמָה֙ <S%H7413><s%> the height וַחֲנִית֣וֹ <S%H2595><s%> having his spear בְיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> and all his servants נִצָּבִ֥ים <S%H5324><s%> [were] standing עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> around

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Then Saul לַֽעֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants הַנִּצָּבִ֣ים <S%H5324><s%> that stood עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> around שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> about him Hear now נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> will the son יְמִינִ֑י <S%H3227><s%> right גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also לְכֻלְּכֶ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> to all יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> give בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> will the son יִשַׁי֙ <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse שָׂד֣וֹת <S%H7704><s%> every one of you fields וּכְרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> and vineyards לְכֻלְּכֶ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all יָשִׂ֔ים <S%H7760><s%> [and] make שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> you all captains אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> of thousands וְשָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and captains מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> of hundreds

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> of you קְשַׁרְתֶּ֨ם <S%H7194><s%> That all of you have conspired כֻּלְּכֶ֜ם <S%H3605><s%> for all עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there גֹּלֶ֤ה <S%H1540><s%> discloses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנִי֙ <S%H241><s%> hearing בִּכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> hath made a league בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> me that my son עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> with the son יִשַׁ֔י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> is no חֹלֶ֥ה <S%H2470><s%> and [there is] none of you that is sorry מִכֶּ֛ם <S%H4480><s%> at עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> against וְגֹלֶ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> discloses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנִ֑י <S%H241><s%> hearing כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הֵקִים֩ <S%H6965><s%> hath stirred up בְּנִ֨י <S%H1121><s%> unto me that my son אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדִּ֥י <S%H5650><s%> my servant עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> against לְאֹרֵ֖ב <S%H693><s%> against me to lie in wait כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this ס

וַיַּ֜עַן <S%H6030><s%> Then answered דֹּאֵ֣ג <S%H1673><s%> Doeg הָאֲדֹמִ֗י <S%H130><s%> the Edomite וְה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> who נִצָּ֥ב <S%H5324><s%> which was set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by עַבְדֵֽי־ <S%H5650><s%> over the servants שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשַׁ֔י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> coming נֹ֔בֶה <S%H5011><s%> to Nob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲחִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> to Ahimelech בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִטֽוּב׃ <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub

וַיִּשְׁאַל־ <S%H7592><s%> And he enquired לוֹ֙ בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְצֵידָ֖ה <S%H6720><s%> him victuals נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> for him and gave ל֑וֹ וְאֵ֗ת <S%H853><s%> חֶ֛רֶב <S%H2719><s%> him the sword גָּלְיָ֥ת <S%H1555><s%> of Goliath הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H6430><s%> the Philistine נָ֥תַן <S%H5414><s%> and gave לֽוֹ׃

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king לִקְרֹא֩ <S%H7121><s%> to call אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִימֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> Ahimelech בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיט֜וּב <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> and all his father's הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּנֹ֑ב <S%H5011><s%> that [were] in Nob וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came כֻלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> and all אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> all of them to the king ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul שְֽׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> now thou son אֲחִיט֑וּב <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> Here I [am] my lord

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said [אֵלֹו כ] (אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> against ק) שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why קְשַׁרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H7194><s%> unto him Why have ye conspired עָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> against אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> have you וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> against me thou and the son יִשָׁ֑י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse בְּתִתְּךָ֨ <S%H5414><s%> in that thou hast given ל֜וֹ לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> him bread וְחֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and a sword וְשָׁא֥וֹל <S%H7592><s%> and hast enquired לוֹ֙ בֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God לָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> for him that he should rise אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> against לְאֹרֵ֖ב <S%H693><s%> against me to lie in wait כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this ס

וַיַּ֧עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אֲחִימֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> Then Ahimelech אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said וּמִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> and who בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> among all thy servants כְּדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> as David נֶאֱמָ֔ן <S%H539><s%> And who [is so] faithful וַחֲתַ֥ן <S%H2860><s%> son in law הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which is the king's וְסָ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> and goeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over מִשְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ךָ <S%H4928><s%> at thy bidding וְנִכְבָּ֥ד <S%H3513><s%> and is honourable בְּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1004><s%> court

הַיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Did I then הַחִלֹּ֛תִי <S%H2490><s%> begin [לְשָׁאֹול־ כ] (לִשְׁאָל־ <S%H7592><s%> to inquire ל֥וֹ <S%H7592><s%> to enquire ק) בֵאלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God חָלִ֣ילָה <S%H2486><s%> for him? be it far from me לִּ֑י אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָשֵׂם֩ <S%H7760><s%> impute הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> let not the king בְּעַבְדּ֤וֹ <S%H5650><s%> unto his servant דָבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> [any] thing בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [nor] to all the house אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> of my father כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nothing יָדַ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> knew עַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> for thy servant בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whole זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> nothing קָטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> of all this less א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or גָדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> or more

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Thou shalt surely תָּמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> die אֲחִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> Ahimelech אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> thou and all thy father's

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לָרָצִים֩ <S%H7323><s%> unto the footmen הַנִּצָּבִ֨ים <S%H5324><s%> that stood עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> and סֹ֥בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> about him Turn וְהָמִ֣יתוּ ׀ <S%H4191><s%> and slay כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <S%H3548><s%> the priests יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also יָדָם֙ <S%H3027><s%> because their hand עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> is with דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> also [is] with David וְכִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> and because יָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> and because they knew כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because בֹרֵ֣חַ <S%H1272><s%> when he fled ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not גָל֖וּ <S%H1540><s%> advertise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [אָזְנֹו כ] (אָזְנִ֑י <S%H241><s%> hearing ק) וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not אָב֞וּ <S%H14><s%> would עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> it to me But the servants הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king לִשְׁלֹ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> not put forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> their hand לִפְגֹ֖עַ <S%H6293><s%> to fall בְּכֹהֲנֵ֥י <S%H3548><s%> upon the priests יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס
